title.rendered: ARTICLE: Are federal measures on housing missing the mark? [Mortgage Broker News, May 2021]

content.rendered: Mortgage Broker News and Vine Group’s David Goncalves and Hugo Dos Reis discuss how proposals to hike the stress test rate might impact the housing market. Full article linked here.
